data.title: Val Geno Findings Death Records
data.meta_description: Lists death certificates I've transcribed or found while looking for genealogy information in Yalobusha, Grenada, Montgomery, Carroll, and Leflore County.
data.meta_site_name: "Learn Your History. You're a Leaf on a Very Big Tree"
